item.description:
Please join us for "Green Drinks"... Lowell’s monthly meeting for casual and informative discussions about alternative energy! The guest presenter of the month will be Jess Reich, founder and CEO of Baystate Biofuels of North Andover. This business has a 160-acre full-scale commercial biodiesel terminal and carries a blend of waste vegetable oil from restaurants and animal fats from rendering facilities.

The meeting is free and open to all. It will start at 5:30 pm at:

Lowell Beer Works
203 Cabot St.
Lowell, MA.
(978) 937-2337
item.how_to_find_us: Lok around or ask at door
item.why: Fun & relaxed way to meet with others
